definition: surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]
he or him/(used for either sex when the sex is unknown or unimportant)/(used before sb's name for emphasis)/(used as a meaningless mock object)/other/another
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: The guitar player gave a fantastic solo during the riffage.
sentences.chinese: 那個吉他手在即興演奏中的獨奏部分表現十分出色。

sentences.english: French polishing is made to order for instrument collectors, dealers and guitarists .
sentences.chinese: 蟲膠漆塗裝適合樂器收藏者，經銷商和吉他手掌握。

sentences.english: Metal guitarists have always been innovators in technique, speed, and skill.
sentences.chinese: 金屬吉他手通常在技巧和速度上不斷創新。

sentences.english: He collaborated with guitarists such as Joao Pernambuco and Laurindo Almeida.
sentences.chinese: 他與吉他手，如若伯南布哥州和勞林阿爾梅達。

sentences.english: "Life" is the autobiography of Rolling Stones guitarist Keith Richards.
sentences.chinese: “人生”是滾石樂隊吉他手基思理查茲的自傳。

sentences.english: Are you a passable guitar player?
sentences.chinese: 你是個差強人意的吉他手嗎？

sentences.english: Guitarist Keith Richards from the Rolling Stones organized the concert.
sentences.chinese: 滾石吉他手基思理查茲舉辦的演唱會。

sentences.english: A jury might acquit you if all 12 of them are guitarists.
sentences.chinese: 如果陪審團的12位成員都是吉他手，他們會放了你。

sentences.english: I was glad to see thee guitarist use an American made PRS guitar.
sentences.chinese: 我很高興看到吉他手使用美國製造的PRS吉他。

sentences.english: I play bass guitar — and keyboards!
sentences.chinese: 我是低音吉他手，我也玩鍵盤樂器。

sentences.english: The guitarist can change the tuning anytime simply by readjusting the screws.
sentences.chinese: 吉他手隨時都可以重新調整螺旋來改變音準。

sentences.english: The guitarist and composer Baden Powell was his protege.
sentences.chinese: 吉他手和作曲家巴登鮑威爾是他的門徒。

sentences.english: Some guitar players tend to overuse the wah - wah pedal.
sentences.chinese: 一些吉他手往往會濫用“哇哇”踏板。

sentences.english: And guitarist John Frusciante left the group in two thousand nine.
sentences.chinese: 和吉他手約翰Frusciante在兩千年九個組。

sentences.english: Heavy metal guitar players use vacuum tube amplifiers to produce extreme distortion.
sentences.chinese: 重金屬吉他手使用真空管放大器造成嚴重失音。

sentences.english: Eagles guitarist Glenn Frey has died at the age of 67, the band has announced.
sentences.chinese: 老鷹樂隊宣佈，吉他手格列弗雷去世，享年67歲。

definition: Bes, a minor god of ancient Egypt
